remarks: Restrict the operands of a function operation to the same domain as that of the operation itself.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2014.)
statement:
ofres.1 $e |- ( ph -> F Fn A ) $.
ofres.2 $e |- ( ph -> G Fn B ) $.
ofres.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
ofres.4 $e |- ( ph -> B e. W ) $.
ofres.5 $e |- ( A i^i B ) = C $.
ofres $p |- ( ph -> ( F oF R G ) = ( ( F |` C ) oF R ( G |` C ) ) ) $.
